sql.where:
b.`status` = 0 AND b.`regist_status` IN (1,4)
AND b.borrow_nid LIKE CONCAT('%', #{borrowNidSrch}, '%')
AND bi.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{borrowNameSrch}, '%')
AND b.borrow_user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{usernameSrch}, '%')
AND b.project_type = #{projectTypeSrch}
AND b.borrow_style = #{borrowStyleSrch}
AND b.create_time >= STR_TO_DATE(#{timeStartSrch}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND b.create_time <= STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{timeEndSrch}, ' 23:59:59'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ht_borrow b LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_info bi ON bi.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_style bs ON bs.nid = b.borrow_style LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type bpt ON bpt.borrow_cd = CAST(b.project_type AS CHAR)
